data.title: ICRA Expands Analytics Capabilities with $26 Million Fintellix Acquisition
data.description: ICRA has acquired a 100% stake in Fintellix India for USD 26 million, enhancing its risk and analytics solutions.

data.title: Universal Cables Hit by EU Countervailing Duty on Optical Fibre Cables
data.description: Universal Cables faces challenges as the EU imposes a countervailing duty on Indian optical fibre cables, potentially impacting its revenue and market position.

data.title: Moneyboxx Finance Seeks NSE Approval for Equity Listing: A Strategic Move
data.description: Moneyboxx Finance has submitted its application to the NSE for in-principle approval to list its equity shares, marking a significant step in its growth strategy.

data.title: Dixon Technologies Partners with Signify Innovations for Lighting Manufacturing
data.description: Dixon Technologies has formed a 50:50 joint venture with Signify Innovations India for OEM manufacturing of lighting products, enhancing its market position in the lighting sector.

data.title: Talbros Automotive Secures ₹580 Crore Orders, Boosting EV and Export Growth
data.description: Talbros Automotive and its joint ventures have secured multi-year orders worth ₹580 crore, enhancing their EV and export growth prospects.

data.title: Crompton Greaves Secures Major Solar Order Worth ₹1.01 Billion
data.description: Crompton Greaves secures a ₹1.01 billion order from Maharashtra Energy Department for 4,500 solar water pumping systems, enhancing its renewable energy portfolio.

data.title: Torrent Power Secures Major Solar Project, Boosting Renewable Energy Ambitions
data.description: Torrent Power's subsidiary, Torrent Green Energy, secures a 300 MW solar project from SECI at ₹3.97/unit, with a ₹26.5 billion investment.

data.title: Akzo Nobel India Approves Major Intragroup Business Transfer to Boost Efficiency
data.description: Akzo Nobel India's board has approved a significant intragroup business transfer, enhancing operational efficiency. This move follows supervisory board clearance, indicating strategic alignment within the company.

data.title: Jubilant Pharmova Divests API Business to Focus on Core Operations
data.description: Jubilant Pharmova's board has approved the sale of its API business to Jubilant Biosys on a slump sale basis, aiming to streamline operations and enhance focus on core segments.

data.title: NBCC (India) Secures ₹5.18 Billion Order, Boosting Growth Prospects
data.description: NBCC (India) has secured a significant order worth ₹5.18 billion, enhancing its project portfolio and growth prospects.
